parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.96

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets [[effectiveCommander]] of the given vehicle. Effective commander is the person who commands the vehicle, i.e. gives commands to the driver. Every time a person gets in or out of a vehicle, effective commander eligibility is recalculated by the engine based on the current [[crew]]. Use this command to force desired effective commander. In multiplayer, execute globally.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>vehicle [[setEffectiveCommander]] person

</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2 </name>=<value> person: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[setEffectiveCommander]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[effectiveCommander]], [[commander]], [[vehicleMoveInfo]]
</value></part></template>
<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
